nodes.title: Xi Jinping
nodes.short_description: Paramount leader; chairs commissions directing regulatory agendas, personnel, and enforcement priorities.

nodes.title: Communist Party of China Constitution
nodes.short_description: Establishes Party leadership over state regulators, guiding mandates and political control.

nodes.title: Anti-corruption campaign (since 2013)
nodes.short_description: CCDI-led campaign disciplines cadres, shaping regulator behavior, enforcement zeal, and institutional incentives.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: External rival imposing tariffs and controls, provoking regulatory responses and industrial policy shifts.

nodes.title: U.S. semiconductor export controls (2022–)
nodes.short_description: Restricts advanced chips and tools, driving regulatory support, subsidies, and countermeasures.

nodes.title: WTO accession (2001)
nodes.short_description: Binding commitments spurred regulatory restructuring, legal harmonization, and opening measures.

nodes.title: National Security Law of the PRC (2015)
nodes.short_description: Expands national security remit, prioritizing security across regulation and governance.

nodes.title: Cybersecurity Law of the PRC (2017)
nodes.short_description: Defines cyberspace governance, empowering CAC and compliance enforcement.

nodes.title: Common Prosperity campaign (2021–)
nodes.short_description: Policy drive to reduce inequality, steering regulation of platforms, finance, education, and property.

nodes.title: Real estate sector (China)
nodes.short_description: Dominant economic sector shaping financial, land, and risk oversight priorities.

nodes.title: Platform economy (China)
nodes.short_description: Large internet platforms prompted antitrust, data, and labor regulation intensification.

nodes.title: Ant Group
nodes.short_description: Fintech giant whose halted IPO triggered sweeping financial technology regulation.

nodes.title: Huawei
nodes.short_description: National champion targeted by sanctions, catalyzing tech self-reliance policies and regulatory protection.

nodes.title: Evergrande
nodes.short_description: Property developer crisis forced systemic risk regulation and real-estate deleveraging measures.

nodes.title: P2P lending platforms
nodes.short_description: Explosive growth and failures forced stricter fintech regulation and supervision.
